TextView.android:text: 1. For females the registration fees shall be ₹ 800/- per team in open category and ₹ 800/- per team in school category. 2. For open (men and women) category in football, kabaddi and volleyball, the age limit is 30 years (cut-off date 01/01/91). 3. For basketball, there is no age limit for open (men) and open (women) category. 4. Game of football will be 7 A-side. 5. In any case the total players per team must not exceed 12. 6. This is an open (boys and girls) tournament and age limit is 18 years (cut-off date 01/01/2003). 7. Any entries after 15thMarch, 2021 shall not be considered. 8. Each player should carry Aadhar card as photo ID proof and School Fee Receipt for School players at the time of reporting without which entry will not be permitted. 9. Certificate of Participation will be awarded to all the participants. 10. Winning team and Runner-up team of all the sports will get a trophy, medal and certificate of Appreciation. 11. Tournament timings and venue may change as per the conditions on that date. 12. In case of any dispute, the decision of Jury of Appeal shall be considered final. 13. In case of any misconduct/ dispute with the players / coach / referee, the team shall be disqualified for further rounds. 14. Providing stay for the players shall be our value-added feature of the tournament but not a privilege of the participating teams. 15. The food expenses of the participating players shall not be borne by the host institute. 16. Tentative Timings of the tournament: Morning: 7:00 AM - 12:00PM Evening: 5:00 PM - 1:00 AM
